document_notes.text:
This update for osc fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-3681: Fixed an insufficient validation of network-controlled filesystem paths (bsc#1122675).

relationship.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5

notes.text: A External Control of File Name or Path vulnerability in osc of SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15, SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP5, SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP4; openSUSE Leap 15.1, openSUSE Factory allowed remote attackers that can change downloaded packages to overwrite arbitrary files. This issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 osc versions prior to 0.169.1-3.20.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP5 osc versions prior to 0.162.1-15.9.1. SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12-SP4 osc versions prior to 0.162.1-15.9.1. openSUSE Leap 15.1 osc versions prior to 0.169.1-lp151.2.15.1. openSUSE Factory osc versions prior to 0.169.0 .
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP4:osc-0.162.1-15.9.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:osc-0.162.1-15.9.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
